parameters.name: ApiDestinationName
parameters.description: The name of the API destination. The name must be 2 to 127 characters in length.

parameters.name: ConnectionName
parameters.description:
The name of the connection. The name must be 2 to 127 characters in length.

Note: Before you configure this parameter, you must call the CreateConnection operation to create a connection. Then, set this parameter to the name of the connection that you created.

parameters.name: Description
parameters.description: The description of the API destination. The description can be up to 255 characters in length.

parameters.name: HttpApiParameters
parameters.description: The parameters that are configured for the API destination.
